s;Anuki;Oh this is such a bad idea!{w}{br}I'm not doing this with you, Simon.
s;Simon;I understand, but I must do this.{w}{br}I won't be long.
multi_remove_portrait;Simon;Anuki
move_unit;Simon;13,19
add_portrait;Gesmen;Left;mirror
add_portrait;Simon;Right;right
s;Simon;Senator Gesmen, it's a pleasure to finally meet you.
mirror_portrait;Gesmen
s;Gesmen;Lord Verstadt. I hadn't realized you were invited,{w}{br}but a pleasure nonetheless.
s;Simon;My fiance and I were visiting the city.
s;Gesmen;Ah, Lady Morrissey. A beautiful bride indeed.
s;Simon;I'm surprised you know of us.{w}{br}We are but humble nobles to your distant south.
s;Gesmen;{c:wait;300}Do you know what it is I do, Lord Simon?
s;Simon;You are a senator of Pelopos.
s;Gesmen;That is all?{w} No, I am also its Minister of Information.{w}{br}It is my job to know of you.
s;Simon;Is that so?
s;Gesmen;It is.{w}{br}Look over there.
center_cursor;9,10
s;Gesmen;He was unfaithful with one of their household servants.{w}{br}She has yet to learn this, but the maid is pregnant.{w}{br}This may be one of their last happy nights together.
add_unit;115;23,20;immediate;closest
center_cursor;23,20

s;Gesmen;The old soldier received the Order of Pelopos for his bravery.{w}{br}He was, however, the first to flee the battle,{w}{br}and was awarded only after the last of his comrades succumbed to their wounds.
center_cursor;13,18
s;Gesmen;And you, Lord Simon, parted with an unknown third party-{w}{br}shortly before entering my home. {w}{br}Would you care to share your insight on this matter?
s;Simon;Your astuteness is certainly... impressive.{w}{br}Our bodyguard escorted us to your manse.{w}{br}Nothing more.
s;Gesmen;I see. These are dangerous times.
s;Simon;...
s;Gesmen;After so many betrayals, I regret that suspicion has become second nature.
s;Simon;You have a story to tell.
s;Gesmen;Oh, many, many.{w}{br}But I do not wish to waste your time.
s;Simon;Not at all.
s;Gesmen;Mmmm.{c:wait;1000} I once had a close confidant.{w}{br}She was only a young woman when we met,{w}{br}but she was quite capable. I grew to trust her deeply.

s;Gesmen;After some time, my wife and I had become... estranged,{w}{br}and our infant son received little attention. My friend,{w}{br}that young woman, took it upon herself to kidnap him from us.{w}{br}I truly could not believe it.
s;Gesmen;Many years later, my agents found her, though my son remained missing.{w}{br}Even under torture, she would not give him back to me.
s;Simon;Did you ever find him?
s;Gesmen;Eventually, I gave up. I came to accept her death as my closure.
s;Simon;A tragic situation.
wait;400
s;Gesmen;Quite. {c:wait;600}And now here I stand, neglecting my duties as host.{w}{br}Lord Verstadt, join your fiance.
s;Simon;I apologize for bothering you, Senator.{w}{br}Have a pleasant night.
multi_remove_portrait;Simon;Gesmen
remove_talk;Simon;Gesmen
